resources.string:
How to Use


1. Close and Lock Screen

Tap over proximity sensor for 1 seconds, and vibration will comes out. Then you can leave tapping over sensor and device will be locked and sleep.

2. Open/WakeUp Screen

Tap over proximity sensor for 1 seconds, and vibration will comes out. Then you can leave tapping over sensor and device will be WakeUp and Open the screen.

Slide to view picture guide.
Tap over sensor to open/lock screen. Sensor may be at top right/left corner of the screen.
